titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation touching bookes first printed here, and after reprinted beyond the seas, and imported hither.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiesty: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Westminster, the first day of May, in the twelfth yeere of our reigne. ...
